locations.name: SNU Lake
locations.description: Head over to the lake behind the academic blocks to catch the most beautiful sunrise

locations.name: Horse Stables
locations.description: Meet our prized possession - our five majestic horses at the stables!

locations.name: AnB Atrium
locations.description: Between Academic blocks A and B lies burger, pasta and coconut chutney

locations.name: BioDiversity Park
locations.description: The favorite haunt of the birds and bees in the campus A must visit for a nature lover to see the various biodiversity maintained in campus.

locations.name: Naveen Tea House
locations.description: Chai pe charcha or Kofee with Karan- a drink for every mood

locations.name: Library
locations.description: The best place for socializing, Wi-Fi, AC, books and donuts on campus.

locations.name: A Block
locations.description: It's the engineers' go-to place. Walking through the corridors of this building feels the same as walking through a hall of fame

locations.name: B Block
locations.description: Head here when you feel like you've lost your way. Our admin and academic staff will guide you on the right path.

locations.name: C Block
locations.description: You might find yourself here attending some meetings or classes. But the best part is, you've got CnD and Naveen to your rescue right outside this building.

locations.name: D Block
locations.description: The hub of all classes, and faculty offices.

locations.name: Management Block (G Block)
locations.description: Not a place to explore in your PJ’s, its auditorium bears some of the most prestigious events on campus!

locations.name: Research Annexe
locations.description: The go to place for research enthusiasts.

locations.name: Dining Hall 1
locations.description: The dining hall with the most number of attractions for a foodie with evening snacks to midnight snacks.

locations.name: CnD
locations.description: Your favorite CnD, with the best coffee rolls and chai on campus

locations.name: Dining Hall 2
locations.description: Order food, collect food, eat food.Waiting in long lines to ponder if the food's worth it.

locations.name: Dining Hall 3
locations.description: This Dining hall is the most peaceful and calm place to have food.

locations.name: Nescafe
locations.description: The best and only place for donuts on campus. Your go to place for espresso shots in those late nights.

locations.name: Surya Food and beverages
locations.description: Need a quick snack, head to Surya

locations.name: Swad Kathi roll
locations.description: Just head to Swad. I dare you to finish their roll. Also serves pizza, fries and poha.

locations.name: Rama Enterprise (Shakes)
locations.description: Beat the heat with juice and shakes. Also bring the heat with their spicy Manchurian and Momos.

locations.name: The Anna Cafe
locations.description: Go quickly before the Vadas vanish

locations.name: Mahesh Chinese Fast Food
locations.description: Food joint right outside campus.

locations.name: Adarsh Dhaba
locations.description: What happens at Adarsh, stays at Adarsh

locations.name: Mini Mart
locations.description: The only shop that will fulfill your hunger needs at 4am on those Saturday night outs. It includes a hair saloon for all your styling needs.

locations.name: HDFC Bank
locations.description: My bank has a new service where they text you your balance. It's cool I just don't think they should add ‘LOL’ at the end.

locations.name: Medical Store
locations.description: need medication or band aids?Located in the arcade, this is the go to place for every SNU student.

locations.name: Golf Course
locations.description: Hit ‘Em Long And Straight.
